title: Feature Request - log to Syslog server instead of file
author: odnmaf
body_snippet:
Hello,

it would be nice to log to a syslogserver, instead of a single file.

regards
Marty

iterations.description: This is an optional enhancement already labeled Not Planned and lacks concrete requirements, so it should remain out of scope for now.
This is a net-new enhancement request with no technical details and it is already marked Not Planned.
